pages.text: This spell mimics the $(marked)Evoker$()'s Vex summoning attack in its primal form. The so-called $(marked)Harrows$() summoned by this spell will target whatever their summoner is targeting, for as long as they are able to exist.$(br2)Fittingly, this spell is unlocked by slaying an Evoker.
Harrows act nearly identical to Vexes.
